0cb8cf2c-8579-4cf0-a7f1-79d92f2476e3.name: Elara the Sorceress
0cb8cf2c-8579-4cf0-a7f1-79d92f2476e3.description: A powerful and enigmatic sorceress with a mischievous glint in her eye. She wields ancient magic and has a fondness for riddles.
0cb8cf2c-8579-4cf0-a7f1-79d92f2476e3.motivations: Knowledge, unraveling ancient secrets, personal amusement
0cb8cf2c-8579-4cf0-a7f1-79d92f2476e3.physical_appearance: Slender, long dark hair, piercing green eyes, often wears flowing robes adorned with arcane symbols

a24fa8a4-8777-47a5-ba42-35961e526185.name: Sir Reginald
a24fa8a4-8777-47a5-ba42-35961e526185.description: A brave knight, known for his unwavering courage and dedication to justice. He carries a gleaming, enchanted sword and a shield with his noble house's crest.
a24fa8a4-8777-47a5-ba42-35961e526185.motivations: Justice, protecting the innocent, finding the Dragon's Tear
a24fa8a4-8777-47a5-ba42-35961e526185.physical_appearance: Tall, muscular build, short brown hair, often wears dented but polished plate armor
